entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 80
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
